name: ML-GNIP
tagline: Marklogic connector for Social Media Firehose - GNIP
body:
ML GNIP Connector 
***

MarkLogic Connector to wrap GNIP stream 
***

* Accept GNIP stream in gzip format
* Extract json from gzip
* JSON to XML transformation
* Enrich data using cts:highlight and element co-occurences
* Ingest data into ML
***

_copy the lib folder into indiviual folders prior to running the script_
***

Usage:
***

$	sh twitter-start.sh
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
